tech.title: üõ°Ô∏è Security & Authentication
details: Applies a security-first mindset, ensuring code does not introduce vulnerabilities.
Applies the Principle of Least Privilege (PoLP).
Implements OWASP Top 10 best practices to prevent SQL Injection, XSS, SSRF and CSRF attacks.
Performs regular Fortify scans and code reviews to detect and fix security issues.
Integrated AWS Cognito for user authentication and authorization, sign-up flows and multi-factor authentication (MFA).
Implements JWT-based authentication between React frontend and Node.js backend with token validation and refresh.
Uses role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict user permissions based on roles and responsibilities.

tech.title: üé® Frontend, Design & Accessibility
details: Builds modern, component-driven UIs with React and TypeScript.
Creates reusable modular components to maintain a clean and efficient codebase.
Applies consistent design with Styled Components and shared design tokens for colour, typography and spacing.
Ensures responsive layouts with CSS media queries across all devices.
Collaborates closely with designers in Figma for seamless design-to-code workflows.
Exceeds WCAG 2.2 standards through inclusive design, supporting neurodiverse and assistive-technology users.

tech.title: üèõÔ∏è Backend & Architecture
details: Designs scalable, modular architectures using Node.js, React and PostgreSQL.
Develops RESTful APIs with Express to handle data requests and backend logic.
Builds Node.js background workers to consume AWS SQS queues for AI content generation and notifications.
Documents architecture diagrams to clarify component interactions and data flow.
Applies proven design principles and patterns to ensure maintainable and testable code.

tech.title: ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud DevOps & AI Services
details: Deploys AWS cloud infrastructure with Terraform code-to-infrastructure implementation.
Builds CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for automated, multi-environment deployments.
Manages AWS infrastructure components, including CloudFront, Elastic Beanstalk, ECS and RDS.
Uses Docker for containerised microservices to ensure consistent environments.
Integrates AWS cloud AI services and OpenAI APIs to automate course creation and content generation.
Integrated AWS Polly for text-to-speech and OpenAI for video-to-text transcriptions.

tech.title: ü§ñ Data Science & Machine Learning
details: Builds machine learning models with Python and Pandas to generate data-driven insights.
Developed a model to identify learning preferences by clustering behavioural and performance data for personalised learning.
Explores Neo4j graph databases with Cypher and D3.js for knowledge graph visualisation.

tech.title: üß™ Testing & Performance
details: Treats testing and performance as core to development, ensuring software quality and stability.
Writes end-to-end Playwright tests to simulate key user journeys across React, Node.js and PostgreSQL.
Integrates Playwright into GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines, gating production deployments on test success.
Writes Jest unit tests for backend services to ensure quality, bug-free functionality.
Optimises frontend performance using React Context, memoization and efficient data fetching.
Improves PostgreSQL query speed with indexes for frequently accessed data.

soft.title: üß≠ Leader & Mentor
details: Leads development teams with a balance of technical guidance and people-focused mentorship, ensuring delivery of high-quality features on time.
Champions agile ceremonies including stand-ups, retrospectives and demos to keep teams aligned and clients informed.
Drives roadmap planning and sprint prioritisation, translating strategic goals into actionable plans.
Leads by example in complex feature development and deployments, setting performance and quality standards.
Fosters a psychologically safe and rewarding culture that encourages innovation, accountability and learning.
Mentors developers via code reviews, workshops and documentation to improve team capability and consistency.

soft.title: üß© Strategist & Problem Solver
details: Thinks strategically about software design, aligning technical decisions with long-term business goals and user needs.
Solves complex challenges efficiently, balancing performance, scalability and maintainability.
Demonstrates resourcefulness under tight deadlines and low-resource environments, delivering high-impact solutions quickly.
Responds rapidly to production issues, restoring stability while addressing root causes.
Makes informed, timely decisions, prioritising high-impact work and taking ownership of outcomes.
Identifies risks proactively and implements mitigations to ensure successful delivery.

soft.title: üí° Innovator
details: Proactively improves software beyond formal requirements, enhancing performance, usability and developer efficiency.
Contributes original solutions in planning and design discussions, shaping product direction creatively.
Stays informed on emerging technologies and trends, integrating relevant tools to modernise the tech stack.
Leads proof-of-concept initiatives to test innovative approaches before full adoption.
Encourages team experimentation and critical thinking to deliver smarter, more resilient software.

soft.title: üí¨ Communicator
details: Explains complex technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Engages professionally with internal teams and external partners, providing timely responses.
Leads discussions in technical meetings and projects, ensuring all voices are heard and considered.
Practices active listening and collaborative decision-making to choose the best path forward.
Promotes transparency through thorough documentation of processes, pipelines and architectural decisions.

soft.title: ü§ù Collaboration & Teamwork
details: Works effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver cohesive software solutions.
Facilitates knowledge-sharing and encourages diverse perspectives to reach optimal decisions.
Resolves conflicts constructively, maintaining team harmony and project progress.
Builds trust and rapport across teams through transparency, reliability and engagement.

soft.title: üîÑ Adaptability & Continuous Learning
details: Quickly adapts to evolving technologies, frameworks and team structures.
Embraces change as an opportunity, experimenting with tools and processes to improve delivery.
Continuously expands knowledge in software engineering, cloud platforms and AI to enhance system design.
Encourages a learning culture within teams, mentoring others to adopt best practices and stay current.
